description: Enhances the response with comprehensive information, thorough explanations, and rich context. This decorator is ideal for in-depth learning, complex topics requiring nuance, or when completeness is valued over brevity.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: The level of detail and comprehensiveness

parameters.name: aspects
parameters.description: Specific aspects or dimensions to explore in detail

parameters.name: examples
parameters.description: Whether to include detailed examples to illustrate points

examples.description: Comprehensive detailed explanation of a concept
examples.usage:
+++Detailed
Explain how the human immune system works.
examples.result: Provides a thorough, in-depth explanation of the immune system covering all major components, processes, and functions with illustrative examples

examples.description: Exhaustive detailed analysis of specific aspects
examples.usage:
+++Detailed(depth=exhaustive, aspects=[economic,environmental,social,technological], examples=true)
Analyze the implications of transitioning to renewable energy.
examples.result: Delivers an extremely detailed analysis of renewable energy transition, exhaustively covering all four specified aspects with comprehensive examples
